alert.note: Alert for Morris; Sussex (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 3:19PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Morris and eastern Sussex Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 318 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Highland Lake, or near West Milford, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hopatcong, Kinnelon, Butler, Mount Arlington, Franklin, Riverdale, Hamburg, Ogdensburg, Sussex, Lake Mohawk, Vernon Valley, Lake Telemark, Pellettown, Green Pond, Highland Lake and White Meadow Lake. This includes Interstate 287 in New Jersey near mile marker 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
